definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: end, completeness;—´[[ת]] abs. Job 11:7, Job 28:3; cstr. Ne 3:21 + 2 t.;—

end, ´[[וְעַד־ת]] ´[[בֵּית וגו]] Ne 3:21 even unto the end of the house of Eliashib; [[אוֹר עִם־השֶׁךְ]] ´[[עַד־ת]] Job 26:10 unto the end of (= boundary betw.) light and darkness; [[הוּא חוֹקֵר]] ´[[וּלְכָל־ת]] Job 28:3 and to every end (= to the farthest limit) he exploreth; [[שַׁדַּי תִּמְחָא]] ´[[עַד־ת]] Job 11:7 unto the end of Shadday wilt thou reach (so as to know him fully) ?
completeness, as acc. of manner (Da:Synt. § 70 b) [[שִׂנְאָה שְׂנֵאתִים]] ´[[ת]] Ps 139:22 with completeness of hatred I hate them.
